contentList.content: An exquisite blade that looks as if it is alive. Wielding it gives you some degree of being able to warp reality. It uses your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> for attack and damage.

An exquisite blade that looks as if it is alive. Wielding it allows you to warp reality to some degree. It uses your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> for attack and damage, with the bonus doubled for damage.
The weapon's damage is magical. Wielding it allows you to warp reality to some degree. It uses your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> for attack and damage.
Lash out to attack up to [1] enemies at once and make them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleed</LSTag>.

The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by 1. This effect can stack. The wielder is always <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with this weapon.

The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by 2. This effect can stack. The wielder is always <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with this weapon.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> modifier is doubled for damage when using Veinseeker.
